en: EU Cultural Heritage Prize/Europa Nostra Awards open
Apply now for Europe's most prestigious cultural heritage prize.
EU Cultural Heritage Prize/Europa Nostra Awards open
57-Web home page (text, logo, image of a department)
Applications open for the 2016 awards, which will go to up to 30 remarkable projects and initiatives, as well as seven Grand Prix winners.

The EU Prize for Cultural Heritage / Europa Nostra Awards are an annual event to recognise the dedication of architects, craftsmen, cultural heritage experts, volunteers, schools, local communities heritage owners, and the media.

The 2016 awards will see up to 30 heritage awards and initiatives receive an award, with up to seven award the Grand Prix, as well as a prize of €10,000, and one winning the Public Choice Award, chosen in an online poll conducted by Europa Nostra.

The deadline for applications is 01 October 2015; more information on the application process can be found on the website of Europa Nostra.
